name: Embed Inc.
description: Developer of a mortgage-lending-as-a-service platform intended to originate, underwrite, process, fund, and close loans. The company's platform provides customizable mortgage origination infrastructure from application through closing, enabling developers to integrate mortgage lending into their products and customers to experience the next generation of integrated lending.
one_liner: Developer of a mortgage-lending-as-a-service platform intended to originate, underwrite, process, fund, and close loans. The company's platform provides customizable mortgage origination infrastructure from application through closing, enabling developers to integrate mortgage lending into their products and customers to experience the next generation of integrated lending.
